name: Save The Shelter
description:
This game made by HABAR for MAGARA JAM #3 in 72 hours.

You have a duty, save the mons... animal shelter. Take around from pipes, if you touch pipes you got damage and mutated. And the next level, your game controllers was changed. Try keys and find the truth for jumping bumping.

Keys for jumping:
